title: How to Buy a Cheap Used Tractor

tasks.task: Assessing a used tractor for purchase.
subtasks: Checking the condition of engine oil.
Examining tires for wear and fluid leaks.
Testing steering responsiveness and mechanical components.
Verifying functionality and condition of power takeoff (PTO).
Evaluating appropriate horsepower for land size.
Checking for signs of fluid leaks in hydraulics.
Testing hydraulic lift speed and response.
Understanding the differences between PTO shaft RPMs.
Considering specific needs for larger acreages.
